{{also|balkon|balkón|balkōn}} ==German== {{wikipedia|lang=de}} ===Etymology=== From {{bor|de|fr|balcon}}, from {{der|de|it|balcone}}, from {{der|de|lng|balko|*balk, balko|sc=Latn}}, from {{der|de|gem-pro|*balkô||beam}}; thus a [[doublet]] of {{cog|de|Balken||beam}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/balˈkɔŋ/|/balˈkɔ̃ː/}} {{a|chiefly northern and central Germany}} * {{IPA|de|/balˈkoːn/}} {{a|chiefly southern Germany, Austria, Switzerland}} * {{audio|de|De-Balkon.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Balkons|Balkons|pl2=Balkone}} # {{lb|de|architecture}} [[balcony]] {{gloss|an accessible structure extending from a building, especially outside a window or overlooking a stage}} ====Usage notes==== The plural ''Balkons'' goes along with the northern pronunciation of the word; the plural ''Balkone'' goes with the southern one.
